website_summaries.verdict: A brand known for its quality product. This affordable full-size guitar is ideal for the beginner to intermediate player. Great performance and action.
pros: This full-size guitar is well-crafted with real rosewood fingerboard and bridge, and meranti sides and bottom
High gloss finish to help prevent scratches and marks
Easy to hold for beginner to intermediate players alike
cons: The action isn't great – you need to press down hard with your fretting hand to get a good sound

customer_reviews.title: The PERFECT AFFORDABLE CLASSICAL GUITAR!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't ask for a NICER cheap but brilliant classical guitar! Perfect choice for the price and quality! 5/5 This is my 3rd Yamaha C40 I've bought - one in Beijing, one in Mongolia, and now one in the USA - all three have been FLAWLESS and EXACTLY what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Bum

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have been playing classical guitar for over forty years. I bought the Yamaha C40 for my son thinking it would be a nice full size guitar for him that he could take to college. I was pleasantly surprised after tuning it to find such nice tones. Most classical guitars in that price range are 3/4 size and not the best sounding. I think to get something better would be an upgrade of several hundred dollars. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Converse

customer_reviews.title: Great tone, action could be better out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box the action was pretty.high on the guitar I received. I didn't measure but the height at the 12th fret seemed like it was practically twice as high as at the neck. $25 later my local guitar repairman had filed down the saddle to bring the action to a much more playable height. Still an overall great value: I love the tone and the neck feels quite nice to the hand, but given all of the reviews mentioning the low action, I think I may have developed unreasonable expectations for what it would be out of the box. For the process, I'd still definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Duffy

customer_reviews.title: This is a revised review
customer_reviews.text: My first impressions of this guitar were not good. Now that I have played the guitar for a few months, I have to concede that it is much better than I first thought. Real wood fulfilled its promise of tone improvement over time, A little thought about setup will pay you back. I lowered the strings to improve the action. Considering that this guitar is virtually free, actually undervalued, you get far more than you pay for. This homely guitar will grow in your affections. Shipping was fast, a plus.
customer_reviews.author: John Elliott Welsh

customer_reviews.title: get what you pay for, it’s still a great camp/back yard guitar.
customer_reviews.text: C40 was the first acoustic guitar I had, yeeears ago. After unboxing I noticed 2 nicks on the top.. considering that I witnessed the delivery guy toss the guitar from the truck to the yard before jumping down, picking up the guitar and handing it to me without any apologies or signs of embarrassment I’d say the packaging and guitar has healed up nicely. You’ll want to get a few packs of strings.. these will last a week tops if your a daily player. For the money you can’t beat this guitar and for a beginner, I’d say this is the guitar you want.
customer_reviews.author: Crumblebaby

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice entry level guitar at a good price. The service from the seller was great. I did replace the strings with some better ones than what came on it and it improved the sound and ease of fingering. I would recommend this guitar for anyone just starting out and wanting to play a classical type guitar.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Nice guitar, great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Superb sound and solid construction. Probably not a good choice for beginners due to the price point— Better as a second guitar once you’ve progressed past the beginner stage. One thing to note, this is a full sized guitar so if you have a smaller frame it may be difficult to play comfortably. also, with it being a classical guitar, it does not have built-in pins to attach a strap. Otherwise, it’s a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: BuckinghamDiva

customer_reviews.title: great beginner guitar
customer_reviews.text: I like this guitar. It is my first and after having it professionally set up it sounds beautiful. The neck needed to be a bit straightened. Also, the turn nuts are a little imprecise when attempting to adjust the strings. But for the price it is a very nice little beginner guitar with a very mellow sound.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Linebarier

customer_reviews.title: nice intro guitar
customer_reviews.text: I always loved these Yamaha Classical Guitars. Perfect sound, easy to play and very inspirational. Well constructed, does not buzz, nice neck and body finish, I would change the strings, makes it sound better. It is my main composing guitar at this point, I simply love it. Why the four stars....well because there are way better guitars out there, but for this price, you simply cannot find a better nylon string anywhere. Perfect addition to my collection. Buy One
customer_reviews.author: NoName

customer_reviews.title: Quality and sound
customer_reviews.text: My teen son taught himself guitar on a cheap acoustic. When it was obvious he was serious about playing, I knew we would be looking for higher quality. This guitar doesn’t disappoint. Rich sound and nice to look at, it’s one of four he now owns.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Scheerer

customer_reviews.title: and easily rectified by adjusting the pressure used when playing higher ...
customer_reviews.text: Bass note are vibrant on this. The trade off is the higher notes are a little less audible than I am used to on different wood types. A welcome change though, and easily rectified by adjusting the pressure used when playing higher notes. Overall, nice instrument. VERY LIGHT.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Hurd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully constructed instrument. Materials far surpass what you would expect from a student instrument. Wonderful tone.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Great camping guitar, sounds good.
customer_reviews.text: Held up well. Didn't play much but it sounded amazing as far as I could tell. Sold it to someone and they were very happy to have it for a camping guitar.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Henrickson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome guitar!
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine a little over two years now, been through three sets of strings, and I would have to say it is an awesome beginner guitar. I have learned everything I know on this guitar, and would recommend it to anyone who is looking to buy their first.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner guitar
customer_reviews.text: I've been playing classical guitar for about 15 years now. Not professionally, just for fun. If you want a guitar to start on, or just to play around on, this is a great one. If you want something that's indicative of your many years of expertise, seek your soulmate elsewhere, but you probably already knew that if you've been around guitars for awhile. Like I said, I just like to play and not really worried about "professional tone and resonance" This one is just fun to have around the office.
customer_reviews.author: Just let me pick a name

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality, but minor scratch on top
customer_reviews.text: Good guitar, the sound quality is good as an entry level acoustic guitar. It will be perfect if the product does not come with some scratch on the top surface.
customer_reviews.author: Josh L

customer_reviews.title: Grandson is very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Fifteen year old grandson asked for this for his birthday..sent me the link! He wanted for his music class and is happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: SMTB

customer_reviews.title: Great guitar for beginners!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great guitar for beginners, it was recommended by my kids music teacher. Soon the strings came off, had to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Dups1122

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for age 12 and up.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and suitable for age 12 and up through adult. Good looking, too.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Great beginners guitar
customer_reviews.text: It served me well for more than a year. Might be time for an upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great well built guitar good for me it has i ...
customer_reviews.text: great well built guitar good for me it has i wide neck and nylon strings i have big fingers and don't play alot now i have 2 one for home and 1 for camp
customer_reviews.author: Eric D.

customer_reviews.title: In very great condition. Loved it overall
customer_reviews.text: It came fresh new in box. In very great condition. Loved it overall.
customer_reviews.author: Danh le

customer_reviews.title: so good
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to spend stupid amounts of money on a guitar. This sounds great and will get you far.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great guitar, was playing on a cheap steel string acoustic and switched to this, the difference was unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: Ambraham

customer_reviews.title: Poorly packed
customer_reviews.text: I rated one star because the guitar had a crack upon arrival. Poorly packed.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful guitar, as shown, my boyfriend loved it and plays it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: would have been a wonderful guitar if it wasn't damaged when it was received so back it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great guitar
customer_reviews.text: My son had this guitar and the sound was great. When his guitar broke in an accident, we bought the exactly same guitar again because it sounds so good.
customer_reviews.author: RRM

customer_reviews.title: Expectation fulfilled!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful guitar. Arrived acceptably fast, and in perfect condition. Still can't play haha but I would recomend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Eugenio S.

customer_reviews.title: I bought it used and it looks like new. Shining
customer_reviews.text: I bought it used and it looks like new. Shining, no scratches, clean and sounds beautiful. I can't imagine a better deal, unless of course you are a super experienced guitarist that can notice the difference between a $15 bottle of wine and a $60 bottle of wine.
customer_reviews.author: gabriel ureña

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Guitar
customer_reviews.text: This guitar was exactly what I needed to start learning how to play. It is affordable and has a great sound. The guitar came pre stringed which was nice as I have no idea how to string them.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Very nice instrument! Thanks Yamaha!
customer_reviews.text: Great guitar for a great price. Still in a very good condition after so many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Drive4Fun

customer_reviews.title: Very good guitar
customer_reviews.text: My wife liked it very much. She is very happy
customer_reviews.author: HONG P PHAM

customer_reviews.title: Good classical guitar
customer_reviews.text: I picked up this one and fell in love with it. How I wish I could have it 20 years ago when I was in college. :) Well built, good sound quality. Wondering why there's no "Yamaha" logo on guitar 'head'...
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Got the item on time and in great condition. My 15yr old loves it and was ...
customer_reviews.text: Got the item on time and in great condition.My 15yr old loves it and was very pleased. Beautiful color and design.
customer_reviews.author: Latoya Walters

customer_reviews.title: A good guitar for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: It's lighter than I thought. Sounds okay, not so good but still cannot be complained about. Price is reasonable. Shipment is fast and careful.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi W

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Guitar.
customer_reviews.text: Love this guitar. Came with the strings already on. Took only minutes to tune it. I'm back to playing after many years. Would recommend for beginners as well as experienced players. The nylon strings are easier on your finger tips than a steel string guitar. It stays in tune. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: combothe9

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner classic guitar.
customer_reviews.text: Packaging left a little to be desired. It just came in a box without protective styrofoam inside the box. But the guitar arrived without any damage. Purchased for my daughter who has been playing guitar for 3 yrs now. She gives it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Great guitar and awesome deal
customer_reviews.text: This is without a question a great guitar and a great deal! The sound is amazing. It comes with yamaha guitar bag and toner and CD. I can't ask more for this price
customer_reviews.author: Nawar

customer_reviews.title: Good instrument  for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got my Yamaha guitar a few months ago and considering I am not a professional musician I am very much happy with the sound and performance of my instrument.
customer_reviews.author: SST

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: This is very useful stuff. I was very glad about this guitar. This is simple but goot stuff. Thanks a lot for in-time delivery:)
customer_reviews.author: Igor

customer_reviews.title: It's okay... (insert fake smile here)
customer_reviews.text: I waivered between a 3 and a 4 on this one. First, I don't think this is a good guitar for beginners. It doesn't have true fretting on it, where the note can be played anywhere between the bars. Second, the bridges are set too high, and I have to do some repair before one of my students can play it. Third, HORRIBLE strings. Thick, cheap, and clunky. Will have to be replaced. I did post the first song played on the guitar. There was some discomfort, because it is completely different from the guitar I use. Tone is... Meh. The wood feels too light to be long term....
customer_reviews.author: R. Delrio

customer_reviews.title: She LOVES it!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Fiance after a house fire ruined the one she had. She LOVES it.
customer_reviews.author: Tooze62

customer_reviews.title: Another happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who has been dying to learn how to play guitar. He really loved it! This guitar shows quality but is great for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Guitar came with damaged strings and it wont stay in ...
customer_reviews.text: Guitar came with damaged strings and it wont stay in tune and also a couple of scratches, still not sure if its the strings causing it so im debating if I should return the guitar.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed

customer_reviews.title: It has a great sound. As always the best price on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this guitar. It was suggested by his instructor. It has a great sound. As always the best price on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria D

customer_reviews.title: I am writing a two star review because it says ...
customer_reviews.text: I am writing a two star review because it says on the product description FULL SIZE guitar and I received a half size, which I do not need and have to return, I do not understand how you can make such a mistake. The package was also not insulated well and the cover comes off.
customer_reviews.author: Venelina

customer_reviews.title: dont bother
customer_reviews.text: cheap plastic strings... Two tuning pegs dont work. spend a lil cash and get something good.Yamaha is a good brand.. Just not this line.
customer_reviews.author: cypher203

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my husband as a birthday present ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a birthday present. The neck of the guitar was completely broken off. I'm very upset that his gift was broken and has to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: My son's guitar instructor was very pleased with the sound quality of the Yamaha C40 that ...
customer_reviews.text: My son's guitar instructor was very pleased with the sound quality of the Yamaha C40 that I purchased. My son is equally happy practicing on it. it was also very well packed and shipped promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Fisun Nesbitt

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice guitar for the money. I'm really happy we decided to purchase this one vs a more expensive one. Delivery was really quick.
customer_reviews.author: Yup

customer_reviews.title: What I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This is what I expected, and at a cheap price. Not a professional guitar, but a great purchase for someone like me who is not a professional musician but likes to play every once in a while by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: worth it! its getting my hands into classical style guitar playing
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good, easy on the hands, durable. Very good instrument for beginners!
customer_reviews.author: Sara gidekel

customer_reviews.title: plays  well  out  of  the  box  , sound  very  warm  indeed
customer_reviews.text: plays well out of the box , sound very warm indeed very good sound good sound ok thanks like it
customer_reviews.author: James Wilson

customer_reviews.title: CLASSIC GUITAR
customer_reviews.text: THIS GUITAR IS VERY FIT FOR ME AS A BEGINNER, AND THE SOUND IS RIGHT FOR THIS KIND OF PRICE
customer_reviews.author: Son Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Nice Guitar
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good . Looks Great . Yamaha quality at a bargain price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Yamaha C40 Full Size Nylon-String Classical Guitar, Tan, Full
product_meta.description:
The Yamaha C40 is an affordable, classical guitar from a respected company in the music industry. Yamaha craftsmen have assembled spruce, mahogany and rosewood to form an instrument with excellent tone and playability that will inspire and encourage a player to pick this guitar up again and again! Yamaha classical guitar craftsmen learned the fine art of guitar making directly from the masters. Under the tutelage of Manuel Hernandez and Eduardo Ferrer, Yamaha guitar craftsmen acquired skills that have been handed down from master to apprentice for generations. These acquired skills are put to use every day in the making of Yamaha classical guitars. Through extensive analysis, research and experimentation, Yamaha has succeeded in blending the best and most critical aspects of traditional Spanish guitar making techniques with modern guitar manufacturing processes. These processes include a comprehensive quality check system that ensures each instrument is of the highest standards possible. As a result, Yamaha brings to you an instrument that delivers outstanding quality and performance, at a price that is hard to beat. The Yamaha C40 classical guitar is an excellent choice for the beginning guitarist.

AMAZON.COM
Beginners and young learners alike will appreciate the quality found in this Yamaha C series classical guitar. This quality instrument delivers outstanding cost performance with exceptional playability and tone. The C40 is a full-size nylon-string guitar.
feature_bullets: Designed for Beginners, with an Eye and Ear Toward Quality and Affordability

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars204 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
